title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Health Library Orientation: Customized Information Delivery Sessions

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core health library services (electronic resources, loan policies, literature search systems) with 90% accuracy through VR simulation
Learners can practically locate three or more job-related health information items using search strategies acquired in customized information delivery sessions
Learners provide a satisfaction survey rating of 4.5/5 or higher for health library services within one week after orientation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
